SalesOrderBilling.description: The SalesOrderBilling object cannot be null and cannot be an empty object.

PaymentType.description:
Maps to the field CreditCardTypes.CreditCardTypeId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

CardPaymentReceived.description:
The total payment amount received for this order.
Null values: not allowed
Zero values: not allowed
